 All, whilst cleaning up some old Gunto mounts today, a mate and I stipped down an old saya on mine and when we removed the lining, found it to have writing on it. I assume that the top section is a factory stamp and identification of some kind. Then some numbers ( 1, 2, 7 ) then something, then what looks like Sekishu something. 
      Any idea's, it was an interesting find. 

      cheers 

      Rich

      http://www.whiz.com.au/richard/saya-lining.jpg
